title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take the focus.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo 'Host:'.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the application. 
2. Navigate to the screen with the Combos. 
3. Click on the first Combo 'Host:'.
